innhold.avsnitt: In connection with adoption, you cannot apply for parental benefit until you have a date for assumption of care.
The latest you can apply is 3 months after the date for assumption of care. If you apply at a later date, you will be granted fewer days of parental benefit.

If you adopt from abroad, you can choose if you would like to start receiving the parental benefit when you assume care of the child while abroad, or the day you arrive in Norway with the child. The latest you can apply is 3 months after the date for assumption of care/arrival in Norway. If you apply later, you will be granted fewer days of parental benefit.
